Export Species Richness to Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFF

Source: R/export_richness.R
export_richness.Rd

This function takes a data.table of species richness results and a path to a raster template. It generates a SpatRaster object using the terra package, populates it with the species richness values, and writes the result out as a Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFF.

Usage

export_richness(Results, path)

Arguments

Results

A data.table containing species richness results. This data.table must contain at least the columns cell and SR, where cell refers to the cell index in the raster and SR refers to the species richness value.

path

A character string specifying the file path to a raster template. This raster is used as a template for the output raster.
